data.name: Notion.so - Float TOC
data.description: Notion.so - Float TOC in the Right or Left
data.css: @-moz-document domain("notion.so") { /* * Name:			 Notion.so - Float TOC * Homepage:	  * Author:		Steve yang  * Version:		v1.1  * Updated: 	  03.25.2020 */ /* TOC float */ .notion-selectable.notion-table_of_contents-block { 	position: fixed !important; 	transition: top .2s ease .2s; 	right: 10px; 	left: auto; 	/* change this values , such as left : 10px ; for TOC in the left */ 	top: 150px !important; 	display: inline-block !important; 	width: 210px !important; 	max-width: 100% !important; 	margin-right: 10px !important; 	overflow-y: auto !important; 	overflow-x: hidden !important; 	max-height: 80vh !important; 	min-height: 1vh !important; } /* Hover show long text */ [style="white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.14) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.14) 100%); background-repeat: repeat-x; background-position: 0px 100%; background-size: 100% 1px;"]:hover { 	overflow: visible !important; 	white-space: normal !important; }}

data.name: Bilibili 新播放器优化
data.description:
Bilibili 新版播放器样式覆盖
控制面固定显示
进度条保持激活状态
改为白底控制面，脱离视频窗口
仅影响普通、宽屏模式，不影响全屏下半透明样式
兼容无黑边模式

data.name: Salesforce help articles (dark theme)
data.description:
This is style that i created for my personal use. It covers only some pages with articles from "help.salesforce.com".
You can find it here: https://github.com/azimut3/HelpSalesforce_Stylish
If you would like to contribute your code, I will be glad to add it.

data.name: Classic YouTube Tweaks
data.description:
Little tweaks to make the youtube experience better (if you liked the old youtube.)

It doesn't work with the new Material Design UI, you need to downgrade using this extension for Firefox and Chrome.

Make sure you also install THIS / THIS / THIS to get the description in the side bar and other stuff like the favicon and the word 'views' removed (I recommend turning off the Retro Style in the "More" option under a video) (Install it using Tampermonkey).
